description: A luxury 5-day solo itinerary in Luang Prabang, Laos (Dec 1-5, 2024) focusing on high-end cultural, culinary, and relaxing experiences rooted in heritage and elegance. Five-star boutique accommodations and private services throughout. Budget: $2000.

activities: Arrive in Luang Prabang. VIP airport pickup and private luxury transfer to Amantaka. Relax and enjoy the suite. Afternoon spa treatment at Amantaka. Dinner at Amantaka’s gourmet restaurant.
itinerary.transportation: Private luxury sedan/SUV transfers, including airport pickup/drop-off and local private guides. Optional first-class scenic train rides for day trips.
itinerary.notes: All activities include private guides and concierge service where possible. Spa treatments and gourmet meals are included daily. Recommendations for fine dining and luxury boutiques provided. Adjust hotel selection or luxury cruise options if Amantaka is unavailable within set budget.

activities: Morning private guided cultural tour: temples (Wat Xieng Thong), Royal Palace Museum, and vibrant morning market. Afternoon Mekong sunset cruise with fine dining experience.

Breakfast at hotel. Day trip to Kuang Si Falls with private guide, picnic lunch. Visit Bear Rescue Center. Return to resort for pool & spa. Optional fine dining in the city (Manda de Laos or similar).

Hands-on luxury cooking class in a renowned Luang Prabang kitchen. Afternoon visit to Phousi Hill for panoramic views. Exclusive textile or artisan shopping tour. Evening free for relaxation at resort.
Relaxed breakfast, last-minute shopping. Private transfer to airport for departure.
